name: Eric RICHARDSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Richardson v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Eric RICHARDSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of April, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
65 A.3d 296
Eric RICHARDSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 12 EM 2013.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 17, 2013.
